title: Can I configure more than one email account on my HUAWEI MediaPad X1 7.0?
answer:
Yes.Â   

If you have not configured any email accounts, touch Email, and follow the onscreen instructions.   

If you have already configured an email account, touch Email > > Settings > Add account, and follow the onscreen instructions.   


![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=SupportImage&imagePath=/20150430143142553001.png)  

NOTE: For details about your email account settings, contact your email service provider.
